fields.name: Advocacy & Human Rights
fields.description: Supporting efforts for social justice, civil liberties, and human rights. Examples: Campaigning, legal aid volunteering, awareness raising.

fields.name: Animals
fields.description: Caring for domestic animals or wildlife. Examples: Shelter care, wildlife conservation projects, adoption events.

fields.name: Arts & Culture
fields.description: Supporting cultural institutions and artistic expression. Examples: Museum volunteering, community theatre support, public art projects.

fields.name: Board Development
fields.description: Providing leadership and governance support to non-profits. Examples: Serving on non-profit boards, strategic planning assistance.

fields.name: Children & Youth
fields.description: Supporting the development and well-being of young people. Examples: Tutoring, mentoring, coaching sports, childcare.

fields.name: Community Development
fields.description: Improving local neighborhoods and communities. Examples: Neighborhood cleanups, community gardens, local event support.

fields.name: Computers & Technology
fields.description: Bridging the digital divide and supporting tech needs. Examples: Teaching digital literacy, tech support for non-profits, website development.

fields.name: Crisis Support
fields.description: Providing assistance during times of crisis or distress. Examples: Hotline volunteering, support group facilitation, victim assistance.

fields.name: Disaster Relief
fields.description: Assisting communities affected by natural or man-made disasters. Examples: Emergency response, cleanup, donation sorting, rebuilding efforts.

fields.name: Education & Literacy
fields.description: Promoting learning and literacy for all ages. Examples: Tutoring adults/children, ESL teaching, book drives, library support.

fields.name: Emergency & Safety
fields.description: Supporting public safety and emergency preparedness. Examples: First aid/CPR training, neighborhood watch, volunteer firefighting/EMT support.

fields.name: Employment Support
fields.description: Helping individuals find and maintain employment. Examples: Job search assistance, resume workshops, skills training.

fields.name: Environment
fields.description: Protecting and restoring the natural environment. Examples: Tree planting, conservation projects, recycling drives, park/beach cleanups.

fields.name: Faith-Based Initiatives
fields.description: Community service organized through religious institutions. Examples: Church/mosque/synagogue projects, mission trips, faith-based community meals.

fields.name: Health & Medicine
fields.description: Supporting health services and promoting wellness. Examples: Hospital volunteering, blood drives, health screenings, awareness campaigns.

fields.name: Homelessness & Housing
fields.description: Assisting individuals and families experiencing homelessness. Examples: Shelter support, meal service, building homes (e.g., Habitat for Humanity).

fields.name: Hunger & Food Security
fields.description: Addressing food insecurity and providing meals. Examples: Food bank sorting/distribution, soup kitchens, meal delivery (e.g., Meals on Wheels).

fields.name: Immigrants & Refugees
fields.description: Supporting newcomers in the community. Examples: ESL teaching, resettlement assistance, cultural orientation, legal aid.

fields.name: International Aid
fields.description: Supporting development and relief efforts abroad. Examples: Overseas volunteering, global development projects, fundraising for global causes.

fields.name: Justice & Legal Services
fields.description: Providing legal assistance and supporting the justice system. Examples: Legal aid clinics, court advocacy, prison reentry programs.

fields.name: LGBTQ+ Support
fields.description: Supporting and advocating for the LGBTQ+ community. Examples: Community center volunteering, pride event support, advocacy groups.

fields.name: Media & Broadcasting
fields.description: Supporting community media and non-profit communications. Examples: Community radio/TV support, non-profit marketing/social media help.

fields.name: People with Disabilities
fields.description: Supporting individuals with physical or developmental disabilities. Examples: Companionship, accessibility projects, Special Olympics support.

fields.name: Politics & Civic Engagement
fields.description: Engaging in the democratic process and community governance. Examples: Voter registration drives, campaigning, poll working, community board participation.

fields.name: Race & Ethnicity Issues
fields.description: Promoting racial equity and celebrating cultural diversity. Examples: Anti-racism initiatives, cultural heritage preservation, community dialogues.

fields.name: Seniors / Elderly Care
fields.description: Supporting the well-being and independence of older adults. Examples: Visiting nursing homes, meal delivery, tech help, chore assistance.

fields.name: Sports & Recreation
fields.description: Supporting community sports, fitness, and recreational activities. Examples: Coaching youth teams, refereeing, event support, trail maintenance.

fields.name: Veterans & Military Families
fields.description: Providing support and resources for service members, veterans, and their families. Examples: Support services, care packages, memorial events.

fields.name: Women's Issues
fields.description: Supporting the empowerment and well-being of women. Examples: Shelter support, advocacy, empowerment programs, mentorship.
